challenge.title: Example Template For Challenge .xml Files creation
challenge.author: Name or email or both
challenge.category: In what category does your challenge belong?(web? crypto? networks?) Category can be arbitrary
challenge.description: Insert some text describing the scenario of the challenge(what the users are supposed to do and if there is any fictional story, fictional stories are cool)
challenge.level: Either an interger from 1 to 10 with 1 being the easiest

sandbox.type: the type of sandbox you need to run the challenge (presently one of "Docker" or "Vagrant") note that if you select Docker your Dockerfile must be in the same folder as this file, same for your Vagrantfile
